content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (41.5, -80.5) and (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at Position (43.5, -80.5)
- Additional Iron Chests at Positions (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at Position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserter at Position (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at Positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (-18.5, -48.5) and (-16.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), and (-9.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at Position (-14.5, -47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without inventory
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement. Check for existing objects that might obstruct placement.

### Errors when supplying resources to furnaces
- Ensure that you have the required resources in your inventory before attempting to supply them to furnaces.

### Errors when transferring excess resources
- Verify that there is space available in the target storage before attempting to transfer excess resources.
